game.name: Fallen Priestess: My Sister's Demonic Bloodline
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 마왕을 물리쳐 악마의 혈통에 깃든 저주로부터 트리나를 구하기 위한 험난한 여정을 시작하세요. 타락시키고 빼앗으려는 자들로부터 그녀를 보호하려면, 위험으로 가득한 던전을 정복하고 적을 뚫고 나아가며 전투 스킬과 제조술 실력을 키워야 합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a thrilling quest to defeat the Demon King and save Trina from the curse of her demon blood. Protect her from those who seek to corrupt and steal her from you. Conquer dungeons, battle dangerous foes, and master unique Synthesis skills in this intense adventure!

reviewHighlights.text: BBQ just gets better and better as each new game is delivered. I think this might very well be the best game ever made by BBQ and maybe the best game...
The storyline is very well-developed, gameplay is solid and the music is worth trying. The mysterious area of ​​the Black Souls particularly intrigued...
